name: Hadith
0:
”Alexa, Open Daily Hadith.”
”Alexa, Launch Daily Hadith.”
”Alexa, Start Daily Hadith.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily hadith
des:
This skill tells you Hadith ( Sayings of The Holy Prophet Muhammad ) from various sources like Al-Tabrani, Ibn Majah, Muslim, Bukhari Muslim, Al-Targhib-O-Tarhib.

Get Hadith at scheduled time everyday.

Log on to Alexa App on your mobile 
1. Tap more on top left.
2. Routines > Tap +
3. When this happens.
4. SCHEDULE and select time.
5. Add action > Tap Skills > Your Skills
6. Select HADITH
7. Choose device and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
